lyrics.lyric: Legends Never Die
Legends never die
When the world is calling you
Can you hear them screaming out your name?
lyrics.tlyric: 你是否能闻世人皆唤你名

lyrics.lyric: Legends never die
They become a part of you
Every time you bleed for reaching greatness
Relentless you survive
They never lose hope when everything's cold and the fighting's near
lyrics.tlyric: 在一切毫无希望与临近的战斗中不失去希望

lyrics.lyric: It's deep in their bones, they'll run into smoke when the fire is fierce
lyrics.tlyric: 烈火狷狂侵衣 余烬终将退散

lyrics.lyric: Oh,  pick yourself up, 'cause
lyrics.tlyric: 整装待发 为了自己而战

lyrics.lyric: Legends never die
When the world is calling you
Can you hear them screaming out your name?
Legends never die
They become a part of you
Every time you bleed for reaching greatness
Legends never die
They're written down in eternity
But you'll never see the price it costs the scars collected all their lives
lyrics.tlyric: 可叹伤痕累然 不见埋骨之川

lyrics.lyric: When everything's lost, they pick up their hearts and avenge defeat
lyrics.tlyric: 天以万物夺之 便以此身为敌

lyrics.lyric: Before it all starts, they suffer through harm just to touch a dream
lyrics.tlyric: 回首向来当年 不过逐梦少年

lyrics.lyric: Oh, pick yourself up 'cause
lyrics.tlyric: 整装待发 为了自己而战

lyrics.lyric: Legends never die
When the world is calling you
Can you hear them screaming out your name?
lyrics.tlyric: 你能听见世人皆唤你名吗？

lyrics.lyric: Legends never die
They become a part of you
Every time you bleed for reaching greatness
Legends never die
When the world is calling out your name
Begging you to fight
Pick yourself up once more
pick yourself up, 'cause
Legends never die
When the world is calling you
Can you hear them screaming out your name?
Legends never die
They become a part of you
Every time you bleed for reaching greatness
Legends never die

tlyric.lyric:
[00:12.390]传奇永不湮灭
[00:16.270]当这个世界在呼唤你
[00:19.420]你是否能闻世人皆唤你名
[00:25.920]传奇永不湮灭
[00:29.820]镌刻传奇于己
[00:33.160]浴血谱曲争锋
[00:39.310]披星执剑求生
[00:43.820]在一切毫无希望与临近的战斗中不失去希望
[00:50.320]烈火狷狂侵衣 余烬终将退散
[00:57.110]整装待发 为了自己而战
[00:59.910]传奇永不湮灭
[01:03.908]当这个世界需要你
[01:07.719]世人皆唤你名
[01:14.009]传奇永不湮灭
[01:17.920]镌刻传奇于己
[01:21.409]浴血谱曲传奇
[01:27.709]再以永恒为基
[01:31.500]铸成传奇不熄
[01:34.989]可叹伤痕累然 不见埋骨之川
[01:45.340]天以万物夺之 便以此身为敌
[01:52.269]回首向来当年 不过逐梦少年
[01:59.009]整装待发 为了自己而战
[02:01.959]传奇永不湮灭
[02:05.799]当这个世界需要你
[02:09.188]你能听见世人皆唤你名吗？
[02:15.539]传奇永不湮灭
[02:19.389]镌刻传奇于己
[02:22.839]浴血谱曲传奇
[02:29.179]铸成传奇不熄
[02:35.669]世人皆唤你名
[02:42.910]祈求剑刃再起
[02:50.960]再次振作起来
[02:54.399]为了自己而战
[02:57.099]传奇永不湮灭
[03:00.838]当这个世界需要你
[03:04.338]世人皆唤你名
[03:10.278]再以永恒为基
[03:14.229]镌刻传奇于己
[03:17.979]三千热血洒尽
[03:24.369]传奇永不湮灭
